T02D2688:269a-1: sa manta mu kha pra be sha rasmi bi ma
T02D2688:269a-2: loshn'i sha pra bh'a sarbba ta th'a ga t'a hri

T02D2688:269a-9: blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad

T02D2688:269a-11: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan
T02D2688:269a-12: ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2688:269a-14: rmongs pa'i dri ma sel mdzad rgyal //
T02D2688:269a-15: gzungs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i sku //
T02D2688:269a-16: thugs rje mnga' la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2688:269a-17: lung dang bla ma'i man ngag las //
T02D2688:269a-18: gzungs la rtogs pa skyes pas 'dir //
T02D2688:269a-19: shes rab gzungs dang bral rnams la //
T02D2688:269a-20: brtse bas gzungs kyi rnam 'grel bshad //

T02D2688:269a-22: rtsod pa'i dus su rtsod mod kyang //
T02D2688:269a-23: rtsod med thub pa'i bka' sde rnams //
T02D2688:269a-24: rtsod pa bcad phyir gzigs mo 'tshal //
T02D2688:269a-25: yang dag bka' rnams ma mthong zhing //
T02D2688:269a-26: nges pa'i lam la mi mos pa'i //
T02D2688:269a-27: lam log lam gol zhugs pa rnams //
T02D2688:269a-28: lam mchog rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung //
T02D2688:269a-29: seng+ge'i nga ro grag pa la //
T02D2688:269a-31: dgrol bka' rmongs pa de dag la //
T02D2688:269b-0: brgyud pa las byung @269b gdams ngag spa //
T02D2688:269b-1: thub pa'i bstan rtsa dge slong yin //

T02D2688:269b-3: dge slong de ni shin tu dkon //
T02D2688:269b-4: rtags dang cha lugs tsam bzung nas //
T02D2688:269b-5: rdo rje theg pa smod byed pa'i //
T02D2688:269b-6: rtog ges gzhung 'di smad mi bya //
T02D2688:269b-7: sngags gzhung la la chud mod kyang //
T02D2688:269b-8: log spyad dam tshig mi bsrung la //
T02D2688:269b-9: sngags gzhung gsang bar bya dgos na //

T02D2688:269b-11: dad med rnam g-yeng le lo can //
T02D2688:269b-12: bag med sems rtsub ser sna che //
T02D2688:269b-13: g-yo sgyu 'dod sred gnyid brkam che //
T02D2688:269b-14: byas gzo snying rje shes rab chung //
T02D2688:269b-15: bar chad 'di dag dang ldan na //

T02D2688:269b-20: blo ldan drin gzo 'tshe ba bral //

T02D2688:269b-26: bsdus pa dgos pa'i don bcas dang //
T02D2688:269b-27: tshig don bcas dang brgal lan bcas //
T02D2688:269b-28: mtshams sbyar bcas pas bsnyad par bya //
T02D2688:269b-29: zhes pa'i tshul gyis rtogs pa 'di'i bsdus pa'i don rnam pa bdun te /
T02D2688:269b-33: shes par bya ba'i yul dang /
T02D2688:269b-34: nyams su blang ba'i thabs dang /
T02D2688:269b-35: bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T02D2688:269b-37: de la gleng gzhi la gnyis te /
T02D2688:269b-40: dang po ni sdud pa po rang nyid la yid
T02D2688:269b-41: ches par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du smos so
T02D2688:269b-42: // gnyis pa ni don gyi gnas skabs brda sprad pa'i phyir zhus lan gyi tshul du gsungs so //
T02D2688:269b-43: de gnyis car yang rang la ldog pa gcod cing don la dran pa bskyed pa ste /
T02D2688:269b-45: gleng bslang ba ni don nyid gzhan gyi spyod yul
T02D2688:269b-46: du ji ltar 'gyur ba zhus len gyi tshul gyis
T02D2688:269b-47: bsdus nas bkod pa ste gzhung 'byung ba'i rkyen no
T02D2688:269b-48: // rten gyi gang zag ni bsgrub tu rung ba dang /
T02D2688:269b-50: shes par bya ba'i yul ni don dam dang kun rdzob bo //
T02D2688:270a-3: rnam par byang ba ni gnyis te /
T02D2688:270a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab dang snying rje'o //
T02D2688:270a-5: de ni shes rab kyis 'khor bar mi ltung ba dang /
T02D2688:270a-6: snying rjes mya ngan las 'das par mi bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2688:270a-7: dang po ni lhag pa shes rab ste don gyi gzungs so //
T02D2688:270a-8: gnyis pa ni 'jug ldog la rmongs pa'i sems can
T02D2688:270a-9: rnams la snying rje chen po 'byung pa'i phyir tshig
T02D2688:270a-10: gi gzungs so // bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po ni sngags dang rgyud dang phyag rgya'i tshul lo //
T02D2688:270a-11: thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni thun mong gi dngos grub dang mchog gi dngos grub bo //
T02D2688:270a-12: de dag ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D2688:270a-13: dgos pa'i don ni yang dag pa'i lam gyi gol sa gcad pa'o //
T02D2688:270a-14: dran pa dang shes rab kun nas sgo dbyings rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang /
T02D2688:270a-15: 'od zer khyad par gyi dpyod pa rtog pa'i dra
T02D2688:270a-16: ba sel ba de dag yang dag pa'i la ma
T02D2688:270a-17: mo // gol sa ni ma rtogs pa dang /
T02D2688:270a-20: don 'di la zhugs na skyon gsum po dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:270a-21: de ltar na de la rim gyis sbyangs pa'i mthus
T02D2688:270a-22: sgrib pa gnyis dang bral nas don yang dag par
T02D2688:270a-23: bde blag tu rnyed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa'o
T02D2688:270a-24: // da ni tshig gi don brjod de //
T02D2688:270a-25: de la brgal lan dang mtshams sbyar ba ni shugs kyis 'ong ngo //
T02D2688:270a-26: de nas zhes pa ni dbang du bya ba dang mtshams sbyar ba dang bkra shis pa'i don to //
T02D2688:270a-27: de la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel
T02D2688:270a-28: gyi rgyud dga' ldan gyi gnas su gsungs pa 'das
T02D2688:270a-29: ma thag tu yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i
T02D2688:270a-30: don du 'di nyid gsungs pa ni /
T02D2688:270a-31: de nas te de dang mtshams sbyar ba'o //
T02D2688:270a-32: ni brgal ba 'di kho na gsungs pa'i phyir dbang du bya'i de nas so //
T02D2688:270a-33: aa tha kha lu zhes kye'am legs so'i sgra yod pas bkra shis pa'i de nas so //
T02D2688:270a-34: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge
T02D2688:270a-35: 'dzin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa bcom
T02D2688:270a-36: pas nyon mongs pa gtan mi skye ste /
T02D2688:270a-37: nyon mongs pa'i bdud bcom pa'o //
T02D2688:270a-38: rgyu nyon mongs pa med na 'bras bu dngos po
T02D2688:270a-39: la mngon par zhen pa med pas lha'i bu'i bdud
T02D2688:270a-40: bcom pa'o // dngos po'i mngon zhen med pas bag
T02D2688:270b-0: chags kyi mtshams @270b mi sbyor te des phung po'i
T02D2688:270b-1: bcom pa'o // bdud bcom pa'o // sdug bsngal gyi

T02D2688:270b-4: bcom pa'o // bdud bcom pa'o // bcom mo // ldan ba ni /
T02D2688:270b-5: dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang //
T02D2688:270b-6: dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang //
T02D2688:270b-7: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs ldan pa //
T02D2688:270b-8: drug ni skal dang ldan zhes bshad //
T02D2688:270b-10: dbang phyug ni sgrib pa thams cad kyi dbang du
T02D2688:270b-11: ma gyur pa'i rang dbang chen po dang ldan pa'o
T02D2688:270b-12: // gzugs bzang ni mtshan dang dpe byad do //
T02D2688:270b-13: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs te /
T02D2688:270b-14: gzhan gyis bsten bya min pas so //
T02D2688:270b-15: grags pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug gi

T02D2688:270b-26: gzugs bzang ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2688:270b-27: dpal dang grags pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2688:270b-29: yang na phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i mdo las /
T02D2688:270b-30: nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos rnams ni //

T02D2688:270b-32: de la bsnyel ba mi mnga' bas //
T02D2688:270b-33: de phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya //

T02D2688:270b-36: chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par lha'i bu rnams la
T02D2688:270b-37: chos kyi dga' ba'i ro myong bar mdzad pas dga'
T02D2688:270b-38: ldan gyi lha'i gnas zhes bya ste //
T02D2688:270b-40: gnas 'di smos pas ni rtogs pa 'di'i sgor zhugs
T02D2688:270b-41: pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams
T02D2688:270b-42: kyang ji srid chos dga' ba chen po'i rigs rgyun
T02D2688:270b-43: mi 'chad par myong bar 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D2688:270b-44: 'khor gsungs pa byang chub ni rnam par dkar ba'i lam rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'o //
T02D2688:270b-45: de la sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2688:271a-0: de nyid nyan thos dang rang rgyal la yang yod pas 'dir chen po @271a * //
T02D2688:271a-2: de la che ba rnam pa bdun dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //

T02D2688:271a-5: sems bskyed pa chen po ni bde bar gshegs pa

T02D2688:271a-9: bsam pa rgya che ba la mos pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D2688:271a-10: bde ba skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:271a-11: tshogs chen po ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgyun mi 'chad pas so //
T02D2688:271a-12: dus chen po ni 'khor ba ji srid par gzhan don la 'jug par zhal gyis bzhes pas so //
T02D2688:271a-13: thob pa chen po ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po'i sku'o //

T02D2688:271a-16: chad med pa'i phyir dge 'dun no //
T02D2688:271a-18: grangs ni rtsod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ma gsungs mod
T02D2688:271a-19: kyi byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi
T02D2688:271a-21: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rigs bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /
T02D2688:271a-25: bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2688:271a-26: de lta bu la sogs pa mu mtha' yas so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2688:271a-27: zhabs 'bring ba lha'i tshogs zhes pa ni chos che
T02D2688:271a-28: bar byed cing bstan pa rgyas par byed pa'i phyir
T02D2688:271a-30: de la chos la mos pa bskyed pa'i 'khor ni tshangs ba'o //
T02D2688:271a-31: rgol ba tshar gcod par byed pa'i 'khor ni khyab 'jug go //
T02D2688:271a-32: bstan pa 'dzin par byed pa'i 'khor ni dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D2688:271a-33: sogs kyis ni phul du byung ba'i sbyin bdag gi 'khor brgya byin dang /
T02D2688:271a-34: gdul bya bzod pa'i 'bras bu tshim par byed pa'i 'khor mtshe ma'i lha dang /
T02D2688:271a-35: rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs pa la dbang sgyur ba 'phrul dga'i lha dang /
T02D2688:271a-36: 'dod pa la gcig tu zhen pa dang bral ba'i 'khor gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha dang /

T02D2688:271b-1: rigs gnas ston par byed pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'khor dang /
T02D2688:271b-2: chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag skyong bar byed pa'i 'khor rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-3: thabs cig pa ni gsum ste /
T02D2688:271b-4: sdud pa'i 'khor phyag na rdo rje dang spobs pa gcig tu sbyar ba'o //
T02D2688:271b-5: nyan pa'i 'khor ni gus pa dang dbyer mi phyed pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-6: gdul bya'i dus la mi ldog pas thabs cig pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-7: bzhugs zhes pa yang gsum ste /
T02D2688:271b-8: sku'i bzhugs pa ni 'chag pa dang /
T02D2688:271b-10: seng ge lta bur gzims pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-12: gsung gcig gis ni gsungs mod kyang /

T02D2688:271b-15: thugs kyi bzhugs pa ni gnyis te /

T02D2688:271b-22: tshad med pa bzhis tshangs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T02D2688:271b-23: rnam thar gsum gyis 'phags pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-24: te zhes pas bzhugs pa nyid ni 'das pa bstan to //
T02D2688:271b-25: 'khor mang po tshogs pa ni mi mthun pa yod
T02D2688:271b-26: na gnyen po 'byung ba'i phyir bar du gcod pa'i
T02D2688:271b-27: 'khor te bdud kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2688:271b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas de

T02D2688:271b-31: kyi lha'i bu thams cad tshogs te bcom ldan 'das
T02D2688:271b-32: kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi lam byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2688:271b-33: des na gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa'i
T02D2688:271b-34: mdor ji skad gsungs pa ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i
T02D2688:271b-35: gnas nor bu rin po che'i khang sgrom chen po

T02D2688:272a-0: sku'i 'od zer rigs mi mthun pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu @272a * //
T02D2688:272a-1: re re mngon par 'dus byas nas stong gsum gyi

T02D2688:272a-3: thams cad kyi lha tshogs rnams 'dir lhags par gyur
T02D2688:272a-4: to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

T02D2688:272a-7: na'o // de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni 'di lta ste /

T02D2688:272a-11: rje sngon du btang ba'i sems kyis bdog pa thams
T02D2688:272a-12: cad yongs su gtong ba la lus dang ngag dang

T02D2688:272a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni rigs dang
T02D2688:272a-18: ngo bo nyid kyis bstan par rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:272a-19: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid ni rigs so //
T02D2688:272a-20: byang chub kyi sems ni smon lam mo //
T02D2688:272a-21: snying rje sngon du gtong ba'i sems ni bsam pa'o //
T02D2688:272a-22: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni dngos po'o //

T02D2688:272a-34: go rims bzhin du brjod par bya'o //

T02D2688:272b-2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2688:272b-3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bya ba byed pa ste /
T02D2688:272b-4: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ces bya'o //
T02D2688:272b-5: tshig bzhi po de dag ni go rims bzhin du
T02D2688:272b-6: rtsom pa dang bag chags dang lus dang rgyu mthun
T02D2688:272b-8: de la rtsom pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te 'byung ba dang /
T02D2688:272b-9: 'byung ba der yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:272b-10: sbyin pa de rgyud la bag chags su bsgo ste
T02D2688:272b-11: de phyi ma las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
T02D2688:272b-12: 'gyur ro // gang gi tshe de nyid yongs su
T02D2688:272b-13: rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe chos kyi sku yongs
T02D2688:272b-14: su 'grub pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D2688:272b-16: de'i 'og tu longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i
T02D2688:272b-17: sku rgyu mthun pa'i sgo nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i
T02D2688:272b-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:272b-20: go rim gyi 'og ma 'og ma la brten pa'i phyir te /
T02D2688:272b-21: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas ni nang dang
T02D2688:272b-22: phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar goms
T02D2688:272b-23: pas lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i byang chub
T02D2688:272b-24: sems dpa' longs spyod kyi phung po chen po yang
T02D2688:272b-25: spangs nas tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin par byed
T02D2688:272b-26: do // tshul khrims rjes su bsrung ba ni gshe
T02D2688:272b-27: yang slar gshe bar mi byed de zhes bya ba
T02D2688:272b-28: la sogs pa rnams kyis bzod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:272b-29: grang ba la sogs pa bzod pa ni de'i gzhi
T02D2688:272b-30: la sbyor ba mi nyams pas brtson 'grus brtsams pa
T02D2688:272b-31: yin no // brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni sbyor ba mtha'i 'bras bu thob pas bsam gtan sgrub pa'o //
T02D2688:272b-32: bsam gtan phun sum tshogs te sems mnyam par gzhag
T02D2688:272b-33: pa ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2688:272b-34: shes pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab 'thob
T02D2688:272b-35: bo // yang gong ma gong ma ni gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:272b-36: tshul khrims ni sbyin ba'i gzhi yin no //
T02D2688:272b-37: de bzhin du shes rab ni bsam gtan gyi gzhi yin pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2688:272b-38: 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sbyin bas phan
T02D2688:272b-39: btags pa'i tshul khrims kyis gnod pa mi byed pa'i
T02D2688:273a-2: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i len pa po so
T02D2688:273a-3: so de rnam par 'tshe ba dang bral bar yo
T02D2688:273a-4: byad kyis bde bar sbyor bas tshul khrims kyi stobs
T02D2688:273a-5: kyis sbyin pa rnam par dag par rig par bya'o
T02D2688:273a-6: // de ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan
T02D2688:273a-7: gnod pa byed pa dag gis bslab pa'i gzhi mi
T02D2688:273a-8: 'dral ba tshul khrims rnam par dag go //
T02D2688:273a-9: brtson 'grus brtsams pas spro ba'i stobs kyis ched du
T02D2688:273a-10: 'khor ba khas blangs pa ni sems can gyi log
T02D2688:273a-11: par sgrub pa'i sdug bsngal bde blag tu bzod pa
T02D2688:273a-13: bsam gtan ni bde ba dang bcas pa dang yid
T02D2688:273a-14: bde ba dang bcas par dge ba'i chos thams cad
T02D2688:273a-15: la sbyor ba brtson 'grus rnam par dag go //
T02D2688:273a-16: shes rab dang ldan pa'i chos rnam pa mang po
T02D2688:273a-17: la rnam par bltas nas nang du zhi bar byed
T02D2688:273a-18: pa ni ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phel bas bsam
T02D2688:273a-20: shes rab med la bsam gtan med //
T02D2688:273a-21: ces pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:273a-22: ji ltar rags pa'i rim gyis kyang go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:273a-23: sbyin pa ni thams cad kyi nang na rags te de'i phyir thog mar rnam par gzhag go //
T02D2688:273a-24: de'i 'og tu bzod pa la sogs pas tshul khrims rags so //
T02D2688:273a-25: de bzhin du shas rab bas bsam gtan rags pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2688:273a-26: shes rab ni thams cad kyi nang na phra ste de'i phyir thams cad kyi tha mar bzhag go //
T02D2688:273a-27: nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2688:273a-30: dri ma med pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2688:273a-31: de la sbyin pa chen po ni nang dad phyi'i
T02D2688:273a-32: dngos po thams cad sbyin ba dang yun ring du
T02D2688:273a-34: skyon med pa ni gnod pas kun tu tshol ba
T02D2688:273a-35: la sogs pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir ro ji
T02D2688:273a-36: skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan
T02D2688:273a-37: pa'i mdo las sbyin pa mi zad pa las brtsams
T02D2688:273a-38: te bstan la / btsun pa sha ra tva ti'i
T02D2688:273a-39: bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa yang
T02D2688:273b-0: btsun pa shar dva ti'i bu @273b byang chub sems
T02D2688:273b-1: dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa yongs su sbyang ba yang
T02D2688:273b-7: kha dog nye bar brtag pa'i phyir zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin no //
T02D2688:273b-8: nyon mongs pa'i sred pa bsal ba'i phyir btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba sbyin no //
T02D2688:273b-9: bde ba dang 'byor ba'i dngos po thams cad bsdus
T02D2688:273b-10: pa'i phyir bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon
T02D2688:273b-11: pa sbyin no // ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang /
T02D2688:273b-12: mdog gser gyi kha dog yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D2688:273b-13: gos 'dod pa rnams la gos yongs su sbyin ba'o
T02D2688:273b-14: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan yongs su rdzogs
T02D2688:273b-15: par bya ba'i phyir mar me 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2688:273b-16: ni mar me yongs su sbyin ba'o //
T02D2688:273b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i snyan yongs su dang bar
T02D2688:273b-18: bya ba'i phyir sil snyan 'dod pa rnams la ni
T02D2688:273b-19: sil snyan yongs su sbyin ba'o //
T02D2688:273b-20: tshul khrims dang thos pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2688:273b-21: dris byug pa'i phyir spos dang byung ba 'dod pa
T02D2688:273b-22: rnams la ni spos dang byug pa sbyin ba'o //
T02D2688:273b-23: gzungs dang spobs pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag
T02D2688:273b-24: gi me tog thob par bya ba'i phyir phreng ba
T02D2688:273b-25: 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba sbyin bar bya'o
T02D2688:273b-26: // lus kyi dri yid du 'ong ba thob par
T02D2688:273b-27: bya ba'i phyir phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye
T02D2688:273b-28: // ma sbyin ba'o // skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
T02D2688:273b-29: ro bro ba mchog tu yongs su rdzogs par bya
T02D2688:273b-30: ba'i phyir ro bro ba thams cad 'dod pa rnams
T02D2688:273b-31: la ro bro ba thams cad sbyin ba'o //
T02D2688:273b-32: sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang skyabs dang /
T02D2688:273b-33: mgon dang dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2688:273b-34: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang tshangs
T02D2688:273b-35: pa'i gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims cha thob
T02D2688:273b-36: par bya ba'i phyir mal cha 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2688:273b-37: mal cha sbyin par byed do //
T02D2688:273b-38: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sa thams cad kyi
T02D2688:273b-39: byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan thob par
T02D2688:273b-40: bya ba'i phyir stan 'dod pa rnams la stan sbyin
T02D2688:273b-41: par byed do // byang chub kyi yo byad thams
T02D2688:273b-42: cad bkang ba'i phyir yo byad 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2688:274a-0: mi rga mi 'chi ba'i bdud rtsis yongs su bkang ba'i phyir sman 'dod pa rnams @274a * //
T02D2688:274a-2: rang dbang dang rang nyams dang rang byung gi ye
T02D2688:274a-3: shes bskang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D2688:274a-4: bran pho dang bran mo yongs su btang ba'i sbyin
T02D2688:274a-5: ba'o zhes rgya cher 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T02D2688:274a-6: dri ma med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-7: dam pa rnam pa 'di gsum gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod pa yin te /
T02D2688:274a-8: dam pa rnam gsum ni 'dris pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D2688:274a-9: ngo bo nyid dam pa dang thabs dam pa dang
T02D2688:274a-11: 'dris pa dam pa ni yun ring po nas sbyin par rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:274a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:274a-13: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyon med
T02D2688:274a-14: pa ni bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa rnam par spangs
T02D2688:274a-15: ba'i phyir te ci rigs su de mi zad par
T02D2688:274a-16: blta bar bya'o // yang dam pa rnam pa bcu
T02D2688:274a-17: gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2688:274a-18: blta bar bya'o // zhes bya'o // dam pa rnam
T02D2688:274a-19: pa bcu gnyis la rgya che ba dam pa ni
T02D2688:274a-20: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mi
T02D2688:274a-21: 'dod pa dang mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-22: yun ring pa dam pa ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du yongs su bsgoms pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-23: ched du bya ba dam pa ni sems can gyi don bya ba'i ched kyi phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-24: zad mi shes pa dam pa ni byang chub chen
T02D2688:274a-25: por yongs su bsngos bas gdung bar mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D2688:274a-26: phyir ro // rgyun mi 'chad pa dam pa ni
T02D2688:274a-27: bdag dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid du mos pa'i phyir
T02D2688:274a-28: phyir ro // ro // sems can thams cad la
T02D2688:274a-29: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2688:274a-30: rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-31: tshigs med pa dam pa ni gzhan gyi sbyin pa
T02D2688:274a-32: la sogs pa la rjes su yi rang ba tsam
T02D2688:274a-33: gyis pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
T02D2688:274a-35: dbang 'byor pa dam pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi
T02D2688:274a-36: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2688:274a-37: pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274a-38: yongs su gzung ba dam pa ni rnam par mi
T02D2688:274a-39: rtog pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
T02D2688:274a-40: ro // rtsom pa dam pa ni mos pa spyod pa'i sa la bzod pa cher gyur pa la'o //
T02D2688:274a-41: thob pa dam pa ni sa dang po la'o //
T02D2688:274b-0: rgyu @274b mthun pa dam pa ni de ma yin pa gzhan brgyad po dag la'o //
T02D2688:274b-1: 'grub pa dam pa ni sa bcu pa dang /
T02D2688:274b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' 'grub pa dang sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2688:274b-3: yang dam pa rnams kyis spyad pa dang bgrod pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te /
T02D2688:274b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyad pa dang bgrod ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2688:274b-5: yang shes bya'i pha rol tu son pas pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D2688:274b-6: sangs rgyas nyid la gnas zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2688:274b-7: yang bdag dang gzhan mchog tu gnod pa las sgrol
T02D2688:274b-8: bar byed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams te
T02D2688:274b-9: / bdag dang gzhan sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho las bzla bar byed par ces pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2688:274b-10: 'di ni re zhig thun mong gi nges tshig go //
T02D2688:274b-11: so sor nges pa'i tshig ni sbyin bdag gi dbul ba sel ba dang /
T02D2688:274b-12: len pa po rnams kyi gdung ba sel ba'i phyir sbyin pa'o //
T02D2688:274b-13: dbang po zhi ba thob pa dang 'gro ba bzang por sbyor ba dang /
T02D2688:274b-14: gsal ba'i gnas yin pas tshul khrims te /
T02D2688:274b-15: go rims bzhin du dbang po rnams kyi sgo sdom
T02D2688:274b-16: par byed pa dang bde 'gror 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur
T02D2688:274b-17: pa dang 'gyod pa med pa la sogs pa'i rim
T02D2688:274b-18: gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi gnas yin
T02D2688:274b-19: pa'i phyir ro // khro ba'i na tsha sel ba
T02D2688:274b-20: dang rma 'byin pa'i sems 'ongs pa sel ba dang
T02D2688:274b-21: pa'i phyir ro // // zhi ba brjod pa'i bzod pa'o //
T02D2688:274b-22: rma 'byin pa sems pa ni gang gis gnod pa
T02D2688:274b-23: byed pa rnams la lan du gnod pa ste de
T02D2688:274b-24: 'ongs pa 'dis 'bral bar byed pa ni sel bar
T02D2688:274b-25: rig par bya'o ; / rma 'byin pa ni 'di
T02D2688:274b-26: dag las shar gnyer ba yod pas rma 'byin pa
T02D2688:274b-27: can te de dag bdag la mi 'jigs pa sgrogs
T02D2688:274b-28: pas bde ba ni bde ba sgrogs par rig par
T02D2688:274b-29: rig par bya'o ; bya'o // sel ba 'phel bar
T02D2688:274b-30: spyod pas brtson 'grus te de sel ba'i phyir spyod
T02D2688:274b-31: pa ni yang dag par spong ba gnyis kyis mi
T02D2688:274b-32: dge ba'i chos dang bral bar byed pa'o //
T02D2688:274b-33: 'phel ba'i phyir spyod pa ni yang dag par spong
T02D2688:274b-34: ba gnyis kyis dge ba'i chos yang dag par sgrub
T02D2688:274b-35: pa'o // 'dzin pa dang sdom pa dang 'dul ba dang thob par byed pas bsam gtan te /
T02D2688:274b-36: de la 'dzin pa ni dmigs pa la sems 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-1: ba ni rnam par g-yeng ba las sems yang dag par sdom pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-2: 'dul ba ni kun nas dkris pa rnams rnam par gnon pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-3: thob par byed pa ni dbang 'byor pa thob par byed par rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:275a-4: gzhan gyi smras pa shes pa dang so so rang gis shes pa dang /
T02D2688:275a-7: rab tu zhi ba thob pa dang /
T02D2688:275a-8: yon tan mchog tu sbyin pas shes rab ste de
T02D2688:275a-9: la gzhan gyi smras pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin
T02D2688:275a-10: yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes
T02D2688:275a-11: rab bo // so sor rang gi shes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-12: rnam par shes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rjes las thob pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-13: zhi ba thob par bya ba'i phyir shes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la gnyen por gyur pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-14: yon tan mchog tu phyin par bya ba'i phyir shes
T02D2688:275a-15: pa ni yon tan khyad par can mngon par sgrub
T02D2688:275a-16: pa'i shes rab tu rig par bya'o //
T02D2688:275a-17: bsgom pa ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2688:275a-18: phung po la gnas pa nas dbang 'byor pa la gnas pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2688:275a-20: phung po gnas pa bsgom pa ste /
T02D2688:275a-21: yid la byed pa bsam pa yin //
T02D2688:275a-22: thabs dang dbang 'byor de bzhin de //
T02D2688:275a-23: de dag thams cad brjod pa yin //
T02D2688:275a-25: rgyu dang rnam smin smon lam dang /
T02D2688:275a-26: so sor rtog pa phung po 'dra //
T02D2688:275a-28: de la phung po la rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2688:275a-29: de la rgyu la gnas pa ni shes rab kyi
T02D2688:275a-30: stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la nan
T02D2688:275a-31: tan gyis goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-32: rnam par smin pa la gnas pa ni gang phun sum tshogs pa'i stobs kyis so //
T02D2688:275a-33: smon lam la gnas pa ni gang sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis so //
T02D2688:275a-34: so sor rtog pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa ni shes
T02D2688:275a-35: rab kyi stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
T02D2688:275a-36: la nan tan gyis goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-37: yid la byed pa la gnas pa ni bzhi ste /
T02D2688:275a-38: mos pa yid la byed pa bsgom pa ni gang
T02D2688:275a-39: la pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan
T02D2688:275a-40: pa'i mdo sde la mos pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D2688:275a-41: ro myong ba yid la byed pas bsgom pa ni
T02D2688:275a-42: pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa rnams la yon
T02D2688:275a-43: tan mthong ba'i tshul gyis ro myang bar byed pa'o
T02D2688:275a-44: // rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pas
T02D2688:275b-0: @275b bsgom pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2688:275b-1: kyi sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa la sogs
T02D2688:275b-2: pa la rjes su yi rang ba'o //
T02D2688:275b-3: mngon par dga' ba yid la byed pas bsgom pa

T02D2688:275b-5: ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i khyad par la mngon
T02D2688:275b-6: par dga' ba'o // bsam pa la gnas pha na
T02D2688:275b-7: pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgom pa rnam pa drug
T02D2688:275b-8: par dga' ba'o // ste / mi ngoms pa'i bsam pa dang /
T02D2688:275b-12: gos pa med pa'i bsam pa dang /
T02D2688:275b-14: de la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la mi
T02D2688:275b-15: ngoms pa'i bsam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gcig
T02D2688:275b-16: cig gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
T02D2688:275b-17: gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su
T02D2688:275b-18: gang ba dang lus gang+g'a'i klung gcig la sbyin par
T02D2688:275b-19: byed ces so // de bzhin du skad cig re
T02D2688:275b-20: re la gang+g'a'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi bskal
T02D2688:275b-21: par sbyin par byed cing sems can gcig la ji
T02D2688:275b-22: lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed
T02D2688:275b-23: pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D2688:275b-24: byang chub la yongs su smin par byed la /
T02D2688:275b-25: rnam grangs 'dis de la sbyin pas mi ngoms pa
T02D2688:275b-26: nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid de
T02D2688:275b-27: / rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa gang yin
T02D2688:275b-28: pa 'di ni sbyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2688:275b-29: bsam pa mi ngoms pa yin no //
T02D2688:275b-30: byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du
T02D2688:275b-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam pa de lta bur

T02D2688:282b-4: thub pa dang rgyal ba dang 'dren pa la sogs

T02D2688:282b-10: rnam par gzigs pa ni phan pa dang bde ba'o //

T02D2688:282b-16: gal te sangs rgyas ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag
T02D2688:282b-17: pa ma yin nam ci'i phyir skabs 'di kho na

T02D2688:283b-0: de khong du chud cing rtogs na mngon par @283b
T02D2688:283b-1: rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro zhes kun la

T02D2688:283b-10: yang na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do //

T02D2688:283b-38: des na mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2688:283b-39: yang na gsum po de spongs nas las dang nyon

T02D2688:292a-24: nas tshigs bcad 'dis gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D2688:292a-26: rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs //
T02D2688:292a-27: padma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs //
T02D2688:292a-28: bde gshegs rigs tshogs ma lus pa 'am //
T02D2688:292a-29: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2688:292a-30: nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D2688:292a-31: brjod mi lang sogs tshogs bcad dang //
T02D2688:292a-32: ded dpon 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs //
T02D2688:292a-33: kun nas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2688:292a-34: bdag kyang yongs su dag pa dang //
T02D2688:292a-35: 'gro ba nyon mongs gnas bsgral phyir //
T02D2688:292a-36: cho ga bzang po 'di'i sgo nas //
T02D2688:292a-37: yid bzhin nor 'dra sgrub byed na//

T02D2688:292a-39: sems can rnams la thugs brtse'i phyir //
T02D2688:292a-40: ye shes can gyi gzigs nas kyang //
T02D2688:292a-41: nye bar byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2688:292a-42: sv'a h'a zhes lan gsum la sogs pa brjod de
T02D2688:292a-43: shar phyogs su kha bltas te gzungs nyi shu rtsa
T02D2688:292b-1: gal te rmi lam dang ltas ngan na rigs pa'i
T02D2688:292b-2: khro bo gang yang rung ba'i sngags mang du brjod
T02D2688:292b-3: de gtor ma dang mchod pa dbul zhing tshim par
T02D2688:292b-4: bya'o // lhag par yang yi dags la gtor ma mang du sbyin no //
T02D2688:292b-5: de ni cho ga thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba dang po'o //
T02D2688:292b-6: de nas s'atstsha brgya pa'i dbang du byas na dkyil
T02D2688:292b-7: 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa dbus kyi pho brang
T02D2688:292b-8: re mig brgya par byas te de yang le tshe'am
T02D2688:292b-9: padma'i khor yug gam sku gdung mchod rten bzhi bsdus
T02D2688:292b-10: pa'i gzugs su byas la cho ga dang ldan pa'i
T02D2688:292b-11: s'atstsha re re rgyan dang bcas pa le tshe re
T02D2688:292b-12: re la me tog steng du gzhag sgo'i nang rol
T02D2688:292b-14: lha snam gyi zur bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag go //
T02D2688:292b-15: shar du dkyil 'khor khru gang ba bdun gyi steng
T02D2688:292b-16: du sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa khri'u'i steng
T02D2688:292b-17: du gzhag go // de'i drung du bum pa gang ba cho ga dang bcas pa gzhag go //
T02D2688:292b-18: me tog ge snod dang spos snod dang byug pa

T02D2688:292b-22: rdo rje rgya gram mam padma bris te gzhal yas
T02D2688:292b-23: khang yod dam med kyang rung ngo //
T02D2688:292b-24: bum pa dang s'atstsha dang sku gdung thams cad kyang nang du tshud par bya'o //
T02D2688:292b-25: shar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag go //
T02D2688:292b-26: lhor stobs po che bklag go //
T02D2688:292b-27: nub du rma bya chen mo'o //
T02D2688:292b-28: byang du mdo sde'i dbang po gser 'od dam pa'i mdo bklag go //
T02D2688:292b-29: shar phyogs su 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2688:292b-30: lho phyogs nas dad pa ldan pas ma mo rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D2688:292b-31: nub phyogs nas klu la sbyin no //
T02D2688:292b-32: byang phyogs nas 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin no //

T02D2688:292b-38: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas rnams dang //
T02D2688:293a-2: bdag gis khrus dang me tog dang //
T02D2688:293a-3: spos dang mar me byug pa dang //
T02D2688:293a-4: zhal zas tshogs rnams khyed la 'bul //
T02D2688:293a-5: khyed kyi dpal dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2688:293a-6: gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis ni //

T02D2688:293a-8: che ge'am bdag la bkra shis mdzod //
T02D2688:293a-9: shar phyogs su sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig sv'a h'a /

T02D2688:293a-11: de bzhin du nub dang byang du'ang brjod do //
T02D2688:293a-12: de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga gnyis pa'o //
T02D2688:293a-13: de nas bsgrub bya dang sgrub pa po rnams gos
T02D2688:293a-14: sar pa gyon cing khrus byas nas kha byang du

T02D2688:293a-16: sna tshogs kyis bdag gi lag pa g-yon pas bskor
T02D2688:293a-17: zhing kham phor gyi tsandan me'i nang du dor ro
T02D2688:293a-18: // de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod la kham phor sgor bskur ro //

T02D2688:293a-20: 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang //
T02D2688:293a-21: tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02D2688:293a-22: khyab 'jug dbang phyug klu dbang po //
T02D2688:293a-23: gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //

T02D2688:293a-25: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang ;
T02D2688:293a-26: / gzhan yang 'byung po mthu chen rnams //
T02D2688:293a-27: de dag kun gyi mthu dang dpal //
T02D2688:293a-28: brtson 'grus gzi brjid byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2688:293a-29: ro langs la sogs gdon rnams kyis //
T02D2688:293a-30: nad dang gnod pa chad 'gyur cig / rdo rjes rin chen phug pa dang //
T02D2688:293a-31: me yis bud shing sreg byed dang ;
T02D2688:293a-32: / rlung gis sprin rnams 'thor ba dang //
T02D2688:293a-33: nyi mas 'dam sogs skems pa dang //
T02D2688:293a-34: seng ges ri dags kun skrag ltar //
T02D2688:293a-35: sngags dang phyag rgya bden pa'i mthus //
T02D2688:293a-36: ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D2688:293a-37: byad stems thams cad tshig par shog / de nas
T02D2688:293a-38: sgrub pa po dang bsgrub bya thams cad kyi mgo
T02D2688:293a-39: la me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02D2688:293a-40: lus dri zhim pos byug par bya'o //
T02D2688:293a-41: de dag ni sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga gsum pa'o //
T02D2688:293a-42: yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2688:293b-0: snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil @293b 'khor la bskor
T02D2688:293b-1: ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o zhes pa ni gong du

T02D2688:293b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa tshig gsum dang 'brel te dran par bya'o //
T02D2688:293b-5: zhes pa'i don 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2688:293b-6: s'atstsha ni thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas kyi sku kho nar bsams te /
T02D2688:293b-7: s'atstsha re re la yang rnam par snang mdzad re
T02D2688:293b-8: rer bsams la de'i ba spu'i gseb thams cad rnam
T02D2688:293b-9: par snang mdzad kyis gang ba'o //
T02D2688:293b-10: de nas s'atstsha'i grangs kyi rnam par snang mdzad bye ba brgya phrag go //
T02D2688:293b-11: de la 'dir gzungs yi ge'i tshul du klog na

T02D2688:293b-16: pa'i skyon spangs nas gzungs ring thung gnyis spel ba
T02D2688:293b-18: de'i tshe sngags dang zla ba'i 'od kyis ye shes
T02D2688:293b-19: kyi 'od zer dang 'jig rten gyi bdud rtsi thams
T02D2688:293b-20: cad bsdus nas zla ba dang yi ge thams cad
T02D2688:293b-22: de nas gzungs thung 'ba' zhig gdon zhing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2688:293b-23: de'i tshe sngags dang yi ge'i 'od kyis bdag dang
T02D2688:293b-24: sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dag par bsam

T02D2688:293b-26: bskor ba'i dus su ni sku gdung gi lha'i grangs
T02D2688:293b-27: brjod kyis mi lang ba bum pa'i nang du yi
T02D2688:293b-28: ge'am phyag rgya'am lha gcig bu'i sku'i 'od kyis bdag
T02D2688:293b-29: dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba
T02D2688:293b-30: dang nang sbyang ba dang dbang bskur bar bsam mo

T02D2688:293b-35: // bya ba pa'o // de yang khrus bya ba'i

T02D2688:294a-29: 'chi med dam chos zhi ba 'du byed bral //
T02D2688:294a-30: chos 'di dag dang mtshungs pa gang yang med //

T02D2688:308b-46: de nas sngon gyi cho gas dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ste /
T02D2688:309a-1: dang gnyis su med par byas nas mchod bstod nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab po //
T02D2688:309a-2: dkyil 'khor gtso bo la sogs pa'i //
T02D2688:309a-3: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams //

T02D2688:309a-5: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02D2688:309a-8: yo byad ci 'byor pa dag gis //
T02D2688:309a-9: gus pas khyod la mchod byed na //
T02D2688:309a-10: snying brtser dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //

T02D2688:309a-13: byed pa la bar du gcod pa sol cig ces
T02D2688:309a-15: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i khro
T02D2688:309a-16: bo chen po rnams la yang mchod pa dang gtor
T02D2688:309a-17: ma phul te / de bzhin du gsol ba gdab po //

T02D2688:309a-20: 'brel par gzungs kyi cho gas sngags brjod do //

T02D2688:309a-22: nub phyogs su ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sna tshogs pa ji snyed ci nus pa bklag go //
T02D2688:309a-23: byang phyogs su ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo bklag go //

T02D2688:309a-25: rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms nas mdun du gtsug

T02D2688:309a-27: bklag pa dang sngags brjod de bdag gi snying ga'i
T02D2688:309a-28: sa bon gyi 'od kyis mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2688:309a-29: lha bskul nas lha'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis khams
T02D2688:309a-30: gsum thams cad khyab nas khyad par du bsgrub bya
T02D2688:309a-31: la phog pas sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i lus
T02D2688:309a-32: gsal bar bltas nas bsgrub bya de'i bshad lam du
T02D2688:309a-33: yi ge du nag po cig bsam mo //
T02D2688:309a-34: yi ge du de'i 'od kyis sa 'og stong phrag
T02D2688:309a-35: nyi shu zhabs su gsal bar byas nas bsgrub bya
T02D2688:309a-36: de'i dbang po'i spyod yul du dmyal khams bcu drug
T02D2688:309a-37: gsal bar bya bar bsam mo //

T02D2688:309a-39: nas mya ngan gyis gdungs te sngon du spyad pa'i
T02D2688:309a-40: sdig pa'i las thams cad dran nas 'gyod cing smre
T02D2688:309a-41: sngags 'don cing bshags par bsams la /
T02D2688:309b-0: skabs 'dir las @309b kyi slob dpon gyis ro de
T02D2688:309b-1: la khrus byas bden pa'i tshigs bcad kyis dug bsal
T02D2688:309b-2: par bya'o // de la tshigs bcad 'di yang brjod do //

T02D2688:309b-9: mogha bi ma le a'a karsha ya zhes pa'i skabs

T02D2688:311b-14: sangs rgyas kyis aom sarba ta th'a ga ta yasth'a
T02D2688:311b-15: aa ham zhes gsungs pa tsam gyis snying ga'i zla

T02D2688:311b-18: de'i shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams du ma nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad byon nas /

T02D2688:311b-29: dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs par gyur nas phyogs

T02D2688:311b-38: zhing zhag bdun gyi mthar rdo rje slob dpon gyi
T02D2688:311b-39: dbang bskur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dang

T02D2688:312a-0: tshigs tha ma gsum po 'di dag gi tshe lam sbyang ba dang lam bstan @312a * //
T02D2688:312a-1: pa thun mtshams thams cad du bya'o //

T02D2688:312a-5: yang na thab tu lha'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ro

T02D2688:312a-14: 'di ltar cho ga 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyi rdul tshon
T02D2688:312a-15: gyis ra bar gtor na phyugs nad med par byed

T02D2688:312a-17: zhing la gtor na 'bu dang rtsa dang sad dang
T02D2688:312a-18: ser ba dang myags pa dang bskams pa thams cad

T02D2688:312a-23: de ltar bdun tshigs kyi tshul de yang byang chub
T02D2688:312a-24: sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel gyi rgyud las gsungs
T02D2688:312a-25: te / dge bas ngan 'gro las grol zhing //

T02D2688:312a-27: phun sum tshogs gang sngon byas nas //
T02D2688:312a-28: de bzhin nyid rtogs sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T02D2688:312a-29: lam rgyu bzang zhing gson tshe la //
T02D2688:312a-30: dge spyod shin tu drag pa ni //
T02D2688:312a-31: mtho ris sam ni thar par nges //
T02D2688:312a-32: de la bar do ma mchis so //
T02D2688:312a-33: lam rgyud dman zhing tshe 'dir yang //
T02D2688:312a-34: ngan spyod shin tu mang po rnams //
T02D2688:312a-35: lha mi dman dang ngan 'gror nges //
T02D2688:312a-36: de nyid nam yang bar do med //
T02D2688:312a-37: las rgyu sna tshogs snang mod kyang //
T02D2688:312a-38: dge la spro zhing mi dge spang //
T02D2688:312a-39: cung zad spyod pa'i ming gang de //
T02D2688:312a-40: bar do de la yod mod kyang //
T02D2688:312a-41: bdun phrag gcig sogs bdun gyi mtha' //

T02D2688:312a-43: mi yi zhag bdun bar do'i tshe //
T02D2688:312a-44: de yi bar do yud tsam bdun //
T02D2688:312a-45: shi ba'i rjes su dge spyod na //
T02D2688:312a-46: bar do bde zhing skye ba yang //
T02D2688:312a-47: bzang po de ma thag tu 'gro //
T02D2688:312a-48: skye ba gzhan du bde spyod 'gyur //
T02D2688:312a-49: shi ba'i rjes su ngan spyod na //
T02D2688:312b-0: bar do sdug bsngal skye gzhan @312b du ;
T02D2688:312b-1: / dman par skya zhing ngan spyod 'gyur //

T02D2688:312b-9: dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha mchod phyir //

T02D2688:312b-11: sngags dang lha yi gzhi brjid kyis //
T02D2688:312b-12: mi dge'i las rnams 'gro gzugs su //
T02D2688:312b-13: rnam smin lus la byung nas kyang //
T02D2688:312b-14: rang rig gnas su song bar dmigs //
T02D2688:312b-15: 'gro ba drug gi dug bsal nas //
T02D2688:312b-16: mthar ni thar pa'i lam gzhag phyir //
T02D2688:312b-18: sangs rgyas zhing du bzhag nas kyang //

T02D2688:312b-24: bar du gcod pa thams cad kyi ming bris nas
T02D2688:312b-25: rdza sar pa'i bum par bcug la bzhag go //
T02D2688:312b-26: mchod rten dang tsha tsha'i chu ji srid pa ni
T02D2688:312b-27: shi ba po'i ro'am rus pa'am gos bkrus pa'i chus
T02D2688:312b-28: bya'o // bum pa'i nang gi steng gi khri la yang shi ba po'i rten bzhag go //
T02D2688:312b-29: yang na tsha tsha'i dus su shes rab kyi pha
T02D2688:312b-30: rol tu phyin pa'i mdo bklags pa'i drung du rus
T02D2688:312b-31: pa gzungs sngags kyi chus khrus byas nas snying po
T02D2688:312b-32: bris pa dkris te tsha tsha'i nang du gzhug go
T02D2688:312b-33: // de nas tsha tsha brgya rtsa brgyad re re
T02D2688:312b-34: zhing dkyil 'khor bris nas bum pa gang ba dang
T02D2688:312b-35: bcas pa mchod cing gzungs sngags brjod do //
T02D2688:312b-36: de'i tshe dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad kyis bsgrub bya de dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D2688:312b-37: gzungs kyi cho ga tshar ba dang bsgrub bya'i rten de la khrus bya'o //
T02D2688:312b-40: gzugs brnyan stong khrus kyis dag par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:312b-41: cho ga'i tshul de dang ldan pa'i tsha tsha stong
T02D2688:312b-42: gis ni bsgrub bya de lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro
T02D2688:312b-43: // khris ni mtha' bral gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:312b-44: 'bum gyis ni dga' ldan gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:312b-45: sa yas ni 'phrul dga'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:313a-1: 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:313a-2: de'i 'og tu gzungs kyi sgo 'bum phrag la mnga' brnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:313a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'bum phrag thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:313a-4: zhing 'bum phrag mtha' yas pa sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:313a-5: cho ga lhag ma ni sngar ltar bya'o//
T02D2688:313a-6: shi ba la phan gdags pa'i rim pa'o /
T02D2688:313a-8: // / gcan gzan dang la sogs pa ni rgyu de phan gdags pa'o //
T02D2688:313a-9: kun nas sgor 'jug pa la sogs pas ni bzlas pa'i grangs gsungs te /
T02D2688:313a-10: lan stong ni shi ba la phan gdags pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so //
T02D2688:313a-11: khri ni 'chi ba slu ba'i tshes brgyad nas nya'i
T02D2688:313a-12: bar du dge slong la sogs pa gang zag bcus
T02D2688:313a-14: 'bum ni bsnyen pa'i bzlas brjod kyi grangs so //
T02D2688:313a-15: 'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ces
T02D2688:313a-16: pa ni snying po 'ba' zhig gur gum dang gi
T02D2688:313a-17: wang dang tsandan la sogs pas sngon bzhin bris nas

T02D2688:313a-19: 'bum tshang nas mchod rten chen po cig gi nang
T02D2688:313a-20: du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng zhing rgyan btags nas
T02D2688:313a-21: mchod do zhes pa ni 'bum gter chen po'i ring
T02D2688:313a-22: bsrel lo // de la mchod rten gyi rim pa ni /
T02D2688:313a-23: ri'am thang ngam ljongs gang dag / dur khrod la sogs spangs pa yi //
T02D2688:313a-24: yid 'ong gnas su rgyal ba yi //
T02D2688:313a-25: sku gdung mchod rten brtsig par bya //
T02D2688:313a-26: yang na sa'am rdo dag la //
T02D2688:313a-27: mkhas pas tshul bzhin brko bar bya //
T02D2688:313a-29: yang na tshogs pas brtsig par bya //
T02D2688:313a-30: de la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni khri 'phang bcu gsum yan chad //
T02D2688:313a-31: sum cu rtsa gnyis man chad do //
T02D2688:313a-32: rang sangs rgyas kyi dgu yan chad bcu gcig man chad de /
T02D2688:313a-33: char kheb dang tog kyang med do //
T02D2688:313a-34: dgra bcom pa'i khri 'phang bzhi yan chad do //
T02D2688:313a-36: rgyun du zhugs pa nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i bar gyi khri 'phang gsum kho na'o //
T02D2688:313a-38: so so'i skye bo'i khri 'phang gnyis 'khor lo bzhi'o //
T02D2688:313a-39: de las sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung cha brgyad du
T02D2688:313a-40: bgos pa'i mchod rten chen po brgyad ni grong khyer
T02D2688:313a-41: ser skyar rgyal po zas gtsang gis yon bdag byas
T02D2688:313b-0: nas dpal lha las babs @313b pa'i mchod rten brtsigs
T02D2688:313b-1: so // yul ma ga dh'a dbus 'gyur tshal du
T02D2688:313b-2: rgyal po ma skyes dgras yon bdag byas nas byang
T02D2688:313b-3: chub chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02D2688:313b-4: grong khyer rtsa mchog tu gyad rnams kyis yon bdag
T02D2688:313b-5: byas nas cho 'phrul chen po'i mchod rten brtsigs so
T02D2688:313b-6: // yul b'a r'a na s'i du ser skya'i rgyal
T02D2688:313b-7: po tshangs byin gyis yon bdag byas nas dpal chos
T02D2688:313b-8: kyi 'khor lo'i mchod rten brtsigs so //
T02D2688:313b-9: yul yangs pa can du rgyal po li tsa byi
T02D2688:313b-10: gzhon nus yon bdag byas nas dpal ka ni ka'i
T02D2688:313b-12: yul mnyan yod du rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis yon
T02D2688:313b-13: bdag byas nas dpal bkra shis sgo mangs brtsigs so
T02D2688:313b-14: // yul chad ger rgyal po bdun 'dzin ta las
T02D2688:313b-15: yon bdag byas nas dpal 'od can gyi mchod rten
T02D2688:313b-16: // brtsigs so // yul ti ka tsa shir rgyal
T02D2688:313b-17: po aindra ba mis yon bdag byas nas mchod rten
T02D2688:313b-19: slan chad kyang de dag gi rjes su 'brangs te brtsig par bya'o //
T02D2688:313b-20: de la byang chub chen po'i mchod rten gyi tshul du brtsigs na /
T02D2688:313b-21: sku gdung gi rmang yod na rmang rten ji ltar
T02D2688:313b-22: mtho ba bzang po rten med na bang rim dang
T02D2688:313b-24: de'i steng du dge bcu ni phyir bskyed pa dang rngams bang rim dang po'i rngams phyed do //
T02D2688:313b-25: gnam 'phang phyi la bang rim dang po'i ngos tshad do //
T02D2688:313b-26: de yan chad srog shing ste bang rim dang po'i gzhi gsum gyi tshad do //
T02D2688:313b-28: bang rim rngams kyi phyir tshad khri 'phang ngo //
T02D2688:313b-29: bum rten khri 'phang gi phyed tshad do //
T02D2688:313b-30: bum pa ni bang rim dang po'i sum gnyis kyi tshad do //
T02D2688:313b-31: stod kyi sked ni bang rim gsum pa dang mnyam mo //
T02D2688:313b-32: bre rten gyi rgya ni bang rim bzhi pa'i lnga cha gcig go //
T02D2688:313b-33: bre ni bang rim bzhi ba'i bzhi cha gcig go //
T02D2688:313b-34: de gnyis ka'i 'phang ni bang rim gyi sum gnyis dang bang rim gyi phyed do //
T02D2688:313b-35: bang rim bzhi pa'i shar dang lhor gsal khung bang rim nyid kyi brgyad cha'o //
T02D2688:313b-36: srog shing gi rtsa ba bang rim bzhi pa la reg go //
T02D2688:313b-37: 'khor lo bcu gsum gyi 'phang du bang rim dang po'i bzhi gsum gyi tshad do //
T02D2688:313b-38: 'khor lo dang po ni bre'i zur bzhi la slebs so //
T02D2688:313b-39: de bzhi chas 'khor ba'i tshad ni 'khor lo bcu gsum pa'o //
T02D2688:314a-0: @314a * // bcu gcig po yang de'i rim gyis gzhol pa'o //
T02D2688:314a-1: rtseg par thams cad ni ci mdzes su bya'o //
T02D2688:314a-2: thugs rjes mdo gzungs 'phang lo chung ba dang mnyam mo //
T02D2688:314a-3: de'i rmad du rngams kyi gzhi gsum ni 'jam po
T02D2688:314a-4: nyid stod du bzhi cha gcig ni phreng ba'i sul
T02D2688:314a-5: bcu drug pa'o // de'i steng du 'khor lo bcu
T02D2688:314a-6: gsum pa nyid kyi shing gi phyed tshad yar rtse
T02D2688:314a-7: phra ba bang rim nyid kyi 'phang phyed do //
T02D2688:314a-8: yang srog shing 'phang du bre phyed tsam steng du
T02D2688:314a-9: zla ba'i rtse mo gdugs dang mnyam srog shing la
T02D2688:314a-10: bskor te rtse mo bgrad do //
T02D2688:314a-11: gdugs ni 'khor lo bdun pa dang mnyam mo //
T02D2688:314a-12: gdugs khebs 'khor lo drug pa dang mnyam mo //
T02D2688:314a-13: za ra tshags ni bre'i 'phang dang mnyam mo //
T02D2688:314a-14: yang srog shing 'phang du bre'i sum cha'i tshad kyi
T02D2688:314a-15: steng du nyi ma zla ba las khyad yud tsam
T02D2688:314a-16: mo // nyi ma'i steng du rtog gi autpala ser
T02D2688:314a-17: po'i tog bu 'dra ste ci mdzes nyi ma dang
T02D2688:314a-18: zla ba dang tog pa thams cad kyi zur la
T02D2688:314a-19: bya mi chags par bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi thur
T02D2688:314a-20: ma rnon po gzer bar bya'o //
T02D2688:314a-21: tog ni ser po nyi ma ni dmar po //
T02D2688:314a-25: gdugs kyi phyogs bzhir rigs bzhi'i phyag rgya bri'o //
T02D2688:314a-26: thugs rje'i phul ni dmar po'o //
T02D2688:314a-27: thugs rje nyid dang shes rab bcu ni ser po'o //
T02D2688:314a-28: 'khor lo thams cad dang srog shing dmar po'o //
T02D2688:314a-31: rmang dang rmang rten ljang gu'o //
T02D2688:314a-32: mchod rten brtsig pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2688:314a-33: da ni mchod rten gyi bum rten gyi steng du
T02D2688:314a-34: sngon nas gdung ma bzhi rgya gram du bri bar
T02D2688:314a-35: bya'o // de ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste /
T02D2688:314a-36: dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i zheng gi gzhi bri'o //
T02D2688:314a-37: de'i steng du rdo leb bam so btang ba'i so phag legs par gzhib bo //
T02D2688:314a-38: de'i steng du bkra shis pa'i sa rtsva munydza gtubs pa dang /
T02D2688:314a-39: bsres pa'i dri bzang po'i chus sbrus nas gro phye dang shing bal bskol bas bsre bar bya'o //
T02D2688:314a-40: rgya ji tsam yod pa'i bcu drug gam brgyad kyi cha ni 'phangs su bya'o //
T02D2688:314a-41: gnyer ma dang sgo 'phur med pa'i gru bzhi par bya'o //
T02D2688:314a-42: de nas thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D2688:314a-43: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyud las skyon med ras bal 'jam po ni //
T02D2688:314b-0: shin tu @314b gtsang ba'i bu mos ni //
T02D2688:314b-1: shar du bltas nas dgu bsgril du //
T02D2688:314b-2: sngags 'di brjod cing bkal bar bya //
T02D2688:314b-3: aom aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta /
T02D2688:314b-4: sarba dha rm'a spha ra sarba dha rm'a aa tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rm'a h'um /
T02D2688:314b-5: shar nub lho byang tshangs thig gdab //
T02D2688:314b-6: tshangs dang dngos dang gru chad gdab //
T02D2688:314b-7: nang gi phyed kyang phyed tshad gdab //
T02D2688:314b-8: rgyab tu phyed phyed tshad btab nas //
T02D2688:314b-9: lnga pa phyi nas cha re gdab //
T02D2688:314b-10: drug pa dbus dkar rgyab ma bkas //
T02D2688:314b-11: bzhi rgyab phyogs bzhir dbus cha bzhi //
T02D2688:314b-12: re re yang ni bzhi bzhir bgo //
T02D2688:314b-13: des ni sgo yi dkyil 'khor lo //
T02D2688:314b-14: pho brang ci bder bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2688:314b-15: de'i rgyab tu cha gnyis kyang //
T02D2688:314b-16: phyed cha re rer bskor ba ni //
T02D2688:314b-18: mchod pa dgod pa'i sa gzhi ste //
T02D2688:314b-19: zhes pa'i tshul gyis thig btab nas sa tshon bkye
T02D2688:314b-20: bas gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs dang dra shar
T02D2688:314b-21: dang zla mdzes dang ba dan la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2688:314b-22: 'khor gyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa bri'o
T02D2688:314b-23: // phyi rol du ra ba rim pa gsum ni
T02D2688:314b-24: sna tshigs padma dang rdo rje sngon po'i phreng ba
T02D2688:314b-25: dang dmar ser me 'od 'bar ba thams cad du
T02D2688:314b-27: skyil 'khor de la lha'i rten dgod par bya ste /
T02D2688:314b-28: sku'am tsa ga li'am phyag rgya'am ming yig kyang rung ste /
T02D2688:314b-29: tshon ma lus pas bris nas dgod par bya'o //
T02D2688:314b-30: de yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i brgyud las /
T02D2688:314b-31: phung po lnga dang bco brgyad khams //
T02D2688:314b-32: 'byung bzhir bcas pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02D2688:314b-34: mi de myur du grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2688:314b-36: de nas lus dkyil 'khor ci lta ba gzugs brnyan
T02D2688:314b-37: gyi dkyil 'khor la'ang lha nyi shu rtsa bdun du
T02D2688:314b-38: nges so // de'ang gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rnam
T02D2688:314b-39: par snang mdzad la sogs pa gtso bo yab yum
T02D2688:314b-40: la lha mo nyi shu rtsa drug gis bskor ba'o
T02D2688:314b-41: nges so // // rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa'o ;

T02D2688:314b-45: yang bzhi bzhir 'gyur la de ltar na rigs 'dus
T02D2688:314b-46: pa'i lha brgya rtsa brgyad do //

T02D2688:315a-4: brgyad zhabs brgyad pa yum dang bcas pa'o //

T02D2688:315a-7: g-yon du zla ba rnam par snang mdzad //
T02D2688:315a-8: shar du ming skyod pa la rigs bzhi dang spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /

T02D2688:315a-10: l'a skye la sogs pa bzhis bskor ba'o //
T02D2688:315a-11: de kho na bzhin du lho nub dang byang du yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2688:315a-12: de ni dbus kyi pho brang ngo //
T02D2688:315a-13: de yang sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud las /

T02D2688:315a-15: dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2688:315a-16: mdog skya byang chub mchog gi rgya //
T02D2688:315a-17: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad do //
T02D2688:315a-18: rig pa kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog / zla ba nyi ma rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2688:315a-20: phyogs bzhi pho brang dbus su ni //
T02D2688:315a-21: rdo rje rin chen padma'i rigs //
T02D2688:315a-22: las kyi rigs rnams so sor yang //
T02D2688:315a-23: rang rig sangs rgyas sras po dang //
T02D2688:315a-24: spyan ma bdag mo dgod dkar sgrol //
T02D2688:315a-25: gzugs sgra dri ro lha mo dang //
T02D2688:315a-26: sgeg mo gar phreng glu ma rnams //
T02D2688:315a-27: phyogs mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya can //
T02D2688:315a-28: g-yon pa rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang //
T02D2688:315a-29: ldem bag zhi ba'i tshul du bsam //
T02D2688:315a-32: byang chub sems dpa' sum cu gnyis //
T02D2688:315a-33: lha yi snam bur dgod par bya //
T02D2688:315a-34: rig pa'i lha mo khro mo che //
T02D2688:315a-35: mos pas sgo la dgod par bya //
T02D2688:315a-37: de yi rgyab tu lha rnams la //
T02D2688:315a-38: bskal bzang sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02D2688:315a-39: sgo bzhir lha mo bzhi'am khro bo bzhi dbus kyi
T02D2688:315a-40: gtso bo la yang gzungs kyi tshul du sgrub pa
T02D2688:315a-42: rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshul du sgrub pa la rigs bzhi nyid do //
T02D2688:315a-43: yang dbus su rigs lnga mtshams su spyan ma la
T02D2688:315a-44: sogs pa bzhi dang pho brang gi dbus su gzugs
T02D2688:315a-45: rdo rje la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D2688:315a-46: sgo bzhir lcags kyu ma la sogs pa bzhi'am yang na khro mo bzhi'o //
T02D2688:315a-47: sgo'i nang gi lha rnams la byams pa la sogs
T02D2688:315a-48: pa byang chub sems dpa' zung re ste brgyad do
T02D2688:315b-0: // rten de dag bkod nas dkyil 'khor yol @315b ba dmar po dang bal re sngon pos bya'o //
T02D2688:315b-1: cod pan dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang gdugs
T02D2688:315b-2: la sogs pa ngos re re yang brgyad brgyad mngon
T02D2688:315b-3: par 'du bya ste legs par dgod /

T02D2688:315b-5: gang de'i gos la sogs pa dang gzugs brnyan gzhag
T02D2688:315b-6: par bya'o ; / de ni dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o //
T02D2688:315b-7: da ni dkyil 'khor de la mchod par bya ste /
T02D2688:315b-8: lha'i grangs kyi mchod pas dkyil 'khor de yongs su
T02D2688:315b-9: bskor nas sgrub pa po phyogs bzhir bzhugs te ji
T02D2688:315b-10: ltar bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rin po che sna tshogs
T02D2688:315b-11: kyi gzhal yas khang par lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa
T02D2688:315b-12: skad cig gis dmigs nas rang bzhin gyis lha bcug
T02D2688:315b-13: ste / nam mkhar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2688:315b-14: pa'i aom yig las 'phrul pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyis
T02D2688:315b-16: gzhung gzhan du gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad dang sngags du mas mchod cing bstod par bya'o ;

T02D2688:315b-18: kyi glu du ma dang smon lam du ma brjod
T02D2688:315b-19: par bya'o // de la bkra shis ni /

T02D2688:315b-23: dag / rab tu brjod kyis de phyir mi rnam
T02D2688:315b-24: bsgrims te nyon // rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan //
T02D2688:315b-25: zla ba nyi 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin /
T02D2688:315b-26: dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2688:315b-27: bkra shis des reng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig
T02D2688:315b-28: / mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam
T02D2688:315b-29: spyod pa // mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin dang //
T02D2688:315b-30: dge ba nyams sems rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2688:315b-31: bkra shis des deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur cig
T02D2688:315b-32: / sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan
T02D2688:315b-33: mdzad cing // yang dag spyin mdzad 'gro ba'i don la mi slu ba'i //
T02D2688:315b-34: rin chen 'byung zhes bya'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2688:315b-35: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur
T02D2688:315b-36: cig / bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol
T02D2688:316a-2: / ye shes padma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan pa //
T02D2688:316a-3: tshe grangs med par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2688:316a-4: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur
T02D2688:316a-5: cig / sems can rnams kyi don la thugs ni
T02D2688:316a-7: /'gro ba mtha' dag 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa //
T02D2688:316a-8: thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang lags pa //
T02D2688:316a-9: bkra shis des kyang deng 'dir zhi byed legs gyur
T02D2688:316a-10: cig / sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan
T02D2688:316a-11: mnga' ba // gser gyi mdog can 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu dang //
T02D2688:316a-12: chos dang dge 'dun lha dang lha min gyis bstod pa //
T02D2688:316a-13: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:316a-20: 'brug gi sgra dang rnga sgra lta bur dbyangs snyan pa //
T02D2688:316a-21: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:316a-25: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:316a-26: padma mdzes dang ye shes stobs dang zla 'od dang //

T02D2688:316a-28: yon tan 'byung gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid 'jig rten gtso //
T02D2688:316a-29: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:316a-30: mi 'khrugs pa ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //
T02D2688:316a-31: 'dren pa mchog sbyin rin chen tog tu byas pa dang //
T02D2688:316a-32: rnam par sel dang lag na rin chen rgyal po
T02D2688:316a-33: mchog / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu
T02D2688:316a-34: dran par byed // 'jig rten dbang phyug rtag tu rgyal dbang gtsug tor can //
T02D2688:316a-35: ston zla dri med lta bur zhal ras mdzes pa dang //
T02D2688:316b-0: nam mkha'i snying po dang ni @316b sa yi snying
T02D2688:316b-1: po dag / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag

T02D2688:316b-4: gzhon nu'i gzugs ni gser mchog 'od dang ldan pa dang //

T02D2688:316b-6: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:316b-7: byams pa shin tu rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mnga' ba //
T02D2688:316b-8: lcang lo 'khril mnga' mchod rten gtsug tor gnas pa dang //
T02D2688:316b-9: kun du bzang dang nor bzangs dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D2688:316b-10: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:316b-18: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:316b-29: gzhan gyis mi thub dbyug sngon bsnams par mdzad pa

T02D2688:316b-31: dran par byed // 'phags pa mi g-yo bgegs rigs rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T02D2688:316b-32: phun sum tshogs byed rmugs 'dzin autpala mdog can dang //
T02D2688:316b-33: glang chen ko rlon stag lpags dag gis brgyan gyur pa //
T02D2688:316b-34: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:316b-35: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang moo dgal 'od srungs dang //
T02D2688:317a-0: @317a * // nor bu 'dzin dang ma 'gags nye ba 'khor dang bcas //

T02D2688:317a-2: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:317a-3: stobs chen bgegs kyi rigs ni rab tu 'joms pa dang //

T02D2688:317a-5: / dug sel sprul gdug rab tu rgyags pa 'jig byed pa //
T02D2688:317a-6: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T02D2688:317a-7: 'phrog ma rna cha rnam pa sna tshogs g-yo 'gul ba //
T02D2688:317a-8: bu pho lnga brgya dag gis brgyan par gyur de dang //
T02D2688:317a-9: gnod sbyin bdag po lnga rtsen dang ni padma'i mig
T02D2688:317a-10: / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran
T02D2688:317a-11: par byed // ha la ha la sems can kun la phan mdzad dang //
T02D2688:317a-12: rin chen sgrol mar grags dang nor gyi rgyun mchog dang //
T02D2688:317a-13: gnod sbyin bdag po rnam thos sras po'i dpal thob pa //

T02D2688:317b-1: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:317b-5: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //

T02D2688:317b-10: rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi mtshan 'di ma lus par //
T02D2688:317b-11: lha la gus bzhin nyin cig bzhin du nang par su brjod pa //

T02D2688:318a-8: gzhan lus dbang po bsgyur ba dang //
T02D2688:318a-9: mdog bzang na rga med thob shog / zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyis //
T02D2688:318a-11: rang rang skal ba ji bzhin du //
T02D2688:318a-12: thogs pa med par byed par shog / gal te le lo'i rkyen gyis gol gyur nas //
T02D2688:318a-13: 'bras bu dam pa myur du ma rnyed kyang //
T02D2688:318a-14: bde 'gro mtho ris lha dbang dam pa dang //
T02D2688:318a-15: chos ldan yul dbus mi lus thob par shog / de nas bla med byang chub ma thob par //
T02D2688:318a-16: las kyi 'khor los srid gsum gar skyes kyang //
T02D2688:318a-17: lus dang srog ni yal bar gyur kyang rung //
T02D2688:318a-18: bla med byang chub sems ni mi gtong shog / bla med byang chub ma thob par du ni //
T02D2688:318a-19: lus dang srog la chags pa med par yang //
T02D2688:318a-20: bag yod mgo la me 'bar ji bzhin du //
T02D2688:318a-21: brtson 'grus chen po rgyun mi 'chad par shog / bdag dang gzhan don byang chub sgrub pa la //
T02D2688:318a-22: bar chad med cing brtson pa ma gtogs pa //
T02D2688:318a-23: 'jig rten dag na sems ni skad cig kyang //
T02D2688:318a-24: bdag gis don med g-yeng bar ma gyur cig / tshe rabs kun du dam chos spyod pa la //
T02D2688:318a-25: mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du ma gyur cig / tshe la nad kyi bar chad med pa dang //
T02D2688:318a-26: skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog //
T02D2688:318a-27: dge bshes dam pa rnams dang mi 'bral zhing //
T02D2688:318a-28: rnal 'byor brtson pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa dang //
T02D2688:318a-29: skyon bral sems dang spyod pa mthun pa yis //
T02D2688:318a-30: 'jig rten dman pa'i gnas la chags ma gyur //
T02D2688:318a-31: byang chub rang bzhin byang chub thob pa'i rgyu //
T02D2688:318a-32: shes rab che dang snying rje che la sogs //
T02D2688:318a-33: bdag cag tshe rabs kun du mi 'bral zhing //
T02D2688:318a-34: rnam thar mang po'i sgor ni 'jug par shog / rgyal srid mtho ris sdug dang gnyen bshes dang //
T02D2688:318a-35: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad dang //
T02D2688:318a-36: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod yul ma gtogs pa //
T02D2688:318b-0: shes @318b rab mchog gis gang la'ang chags ma gyur //
T02D2688:318b-1: gzhan don 'khor pa rnams su spyod pa na //
T02D2688:318b-2: bsdu ba'i dngos dang pha rol phyin la sogs //
T02D2688:318b-3: thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2688:318b-4: 'gro ba rnams su byang chub spyod par shog /
T02D2688:318b-5: de bzhin du gzhan yang smon lam gdab par bya'o
T02D2688:318b-6: // de ni dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2688:318b-7: de nas mchod rten yang dang yang du dri zhim po'i chu ba'i lcib dang bcas pas byugs te //
T02D2688:318b-8: sngon ltar thig btab la lha'i pho brang thams cad
T02D2688:318b-9: dang sgo la sogs pa thams cad kyi ris su
T02D2688:318b-10: bris nas padma dang zla ba'i steng du me tog
T02D2688:318b-11: tshom bu lha grangs su bzhag nas /
T02D2688:318b-12: zhing khams bye ba phrag brgya dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D2688:318b-13: pa brjod kyis mi lang bar khengs par bsams nas
T02D2688:318b-14: tsha tsha re re zhing dkyil 'khor re re ru
T02D2688:318b-15: bsams nas / tshom bu lha grangs su bzhag nas brgya'am /
T02D2688:318b-16: stong ngam khri'am 'bum mam sa ya'i bar du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2688:318b-17: mchod rten gcig gi nang du bye ba las lhag par gzhug par me bya'o //
T02D2688:318b-18: de nas sku gdung gi nang gi khri'am /
T02D2688:318b-20: sgo thams cad bcad nas legs par zhal byug bya'o //
T02D2688:318b-21: 'di ni tsha tsha gzhug pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D2688:318b-22: de'i 'og tu mchod rten gyi ngos thams cad du
T02D2688:318b-23: thur ma mang du btsugs nas de la me tog
T02D2688:318b-24: phreng ba dang ba dan la sogs pas phreng ba'i
T02D2688:318b-26: mchod rten gyi phyogs bzhir mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi byas te /
T02D2688:318b-27: yon chab la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag dngos su bshams pa dang /
T02D2688:318b-28: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs dang nor bu dang 'khor lo dang rta dang glang po che dang ;
T02D2688:318b-31: dmag mi la sogs pa ni bcos pa'i tshul du
T02D2688:318b-32: byas nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs dang sngags su
T02D2688:318b-34: phyogs bzhir mdo bzhi bklag par bya'o //
T02D2688:318b-35: de'i 'og tu snying po nyi tshe brjod cing bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
T02D2688:318b-36: bkra shis brjod la smon lam gdab par bya'o //
T02D2688:318b-37: de yang mchod rten ni mchod rten chen po rin
T02D2688:318b-38: po che'i snying po nam mkha' ma lus pa khyab
T02D2688:318b-39: pa kha dog sna tshogs pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi
T02D2688:318b-40: pa rin po che du ma las grub pa 'od
T02D2688:318b-41: kyi snang ba dang ldan pa bsam mo //
T02D2688:319a-0: tsha tsha re re yang gzhal yas khang re rer @319a * //
T02D2688:319a-1: bsams te bum pa'i nang du ji ltar bkod pa'i
T02D2688:319a-2: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang grangs mnyam par bsams
T02D2688:319a-3: nas khrus byas nas rang bzhin gyi lha dang gnyis
T02D2688:319a-4: su med par byas nas na bza' dang rgyan phreng
T02D2688:319a-5: la sogs pa thams cad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2688:319a-6: de ni mchod rten mchod pa'o //
T02D2688:319a-7: mchod rten thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:319a-8: bdag kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i tshig 'di
T02D2688:319a-9: ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rmi lam lta bur kun
T02D2688:319a-10: du shes so zhes bya ba'i tshig dang 'brel te
T02D2688:319a-11: rmi lam du byung ba ni rjes su spyod pa'i
T02D2688:319a-12: rtags te / las dang po bsam du brjod na
T02D2688:319a-13: sngags kyi mthu bya ba dang bya ba ma yin
T02D2688:319a-14: pa rmi lam du shes par bya'o //
T02D2688:319a-15: tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur pa'i rtags so //
T02D2688:319a-16: de la mchod rten 'bar ba ni sngags dang rdzas kyi mthus drod thob pa'o //
T02D2688:319a-17: bdag 'bar ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus //
T02D2688:319a-18: rdzu 'phrul dang mngon par shes pa thob pa'o //
T02D2688:319a-19: de la rtags kyi rim pa ni gang yang gzungs
T02D2688:319a-20: kyi cho ga la 'jug pa'am zhugs pa'i tshe rmi
T02D2688:319a-21: lam du yid du 'ong ba'i tshal dang /
T02D2688:319a-25: dge 'dun la sogs pa lhan cig dga' ba'am /
T02D2688:319a-28: khri la sogs pa'i steng du gnas pa'am /
T02D2688:319a-29: gru'am zam gzings la sogs pa bsgral bar smin 'dod pa 'grub po //
T02D2688:319a-31: khrus byas pa la sogs pa rmi na sdig pa zad do //
T02D2688:319a-32: mchod rten nam tsha tsha la dri zhim po bro na lha gnas drug tu skye bar nges so //
T02D2688:319a-33: gal te dri cung zad bro ba yang longs spyod dang ldan pa'i mir skye'o //
T02D2688:319a-34: sgra grag na gzugs khams kyi lhar skye'o //
T02D2688:319a-35: 'od byung na rig 'dzin mchog thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:319a-36: de dang de la sogs pa yon tan mtha' yas
T02D2688:319a-37: te sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i rgyud du shes
T02D2688:319a-38: par bya'o // gang 'jig rten 'dir thob par 'gyur
T02D2688:319a-39: ba'i yon tan rnams ni rdzas dang yo byad tshang
T02D2688:319a-43: tshul bsdams pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:319a-44: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'bras bu bzang po ji snyed pa ni dad pa dang /
T02D2688:319a-45: snying rje mchog dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2688:319b-0: lhag pa'i shes rab @319b kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2688:319b-1: de ni ltas kyi rim pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-2: nges par 'phral du la sogs pa ni phan par gsungs so //
T02D2688:319b-3: nges par 'phral du phyir mi ldog pa ni zhi
T02D2688:319b-4: ba la sogs pa'i las grub na gzhan gyi don
T02D2688:319b-5: spyod pa la thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-6: sa bcu la gnas pa ni ral gri la sogs pa rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas brgyad thob pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-7: lung bstan pa thob pa ni mngon par shes pa drug thob pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2688:319b-9: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni
T02D2688:319b-10: phyag rgya chen po'i sku thob pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-11: da ni sngon byung rjes 'jug gnyis pos mtshams sbyar
T02D2688:319b-12: bas gzhung bsdu ba ni de nas la sogs pa
T02D2688:319b-13: gsungs te / mthu chen po ni gong du gsungs
T02D2688:319b-14: pa'i phan yon thams cad bskyed pa la gdon mi
T02D2688:319b-15: gsungs te / za ba'o // yon tan grangs med
T02D2688:319b-16: pa'i 'byung khungs yin pa'i phyir dpe nor bu rin
T02D2688:319b-18: nyan thos la sogs pas mthong bar dka' ba 'di'i
T02D2688:319b-19: don gyi sgra dang tshad ma'i spyod yul ma yin
T02D2688:319b-21: gzung bar bgyi'o zhes pa ni bstan pa'i don la nus pa med pa'o //
T02D2688:319b-22: rgyas par bgyi'o zhes pas sngags kyi ngo bo bzung ste skye ba med na 'gag pa gtan med /
T02D2688:319b-23: ma 'gags pa'i chos la dbang po rab 'bring thams
T02D2688:319b-24: cad rgyun mi 'chad par longs spyod par 'gyur ba'o
T02D2688:319b-25: // sems can thams cad la bsgrag par bgyi'o zhes pa ni /
T02D2688:319b-26: snod du ma gyur pa gang yang med ces bya ba'o //
T02D2688:319b-27: dper na gla rtsi bcug pa'i snod dri zhim por
T02D2688:319b-28: 'gyur ba ltar sngags 'chad pa po yang bying yi
T02D2688:319b-29: rlabs kyi sgo du ma dang ldan par 'gyur bas
T02D2688:319b-30: sems can chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2688:319b-31: phyi bzhin 'brang zhes pa ni dper na mi'i mig
T02D2688:319b-32: gang gi spyod yul la srin bu la sogs pa
T02D2688:319b-34: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i spyod
T02D2688:319b-35: yul du khams gsum thams cad la nye ba dang
T02D2688:319b-37: bsrung ba dang ni gnas dang lus dang longs spyod do //
T02D2688:319b-38: bskyab pa ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las so //
T02D2688:319b-39: sba ba ni bdud kyi 'ching ba las so //
T02D2688:319b-40: bskyang ba ni lam log pa las so //
T02D2688:319b-41: bu bzhin zhes pa ni tshad med pas gzigs pa rgyun mi gcod pa'o //
T02D2688:320a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la sogs pa ni @320a * //
T02D2688:320a-1: dam bca' rjes su gdams pa gsungs te /
T02D2688:320a-2: phyag na rdo rje yang bdag ltar 'gro ba la dgongs pa'i phyir grogs po zhes bos so //
T02D2688:320a-3: legs so dang pos ni kun rdzob tu tha dad
T02D2688:320a-4: par mkhyen pa ste chos 'dzin pa ni bskyang ba
T02D2688:320a-5: legs so // legs so gnyis pa ni don dam
T02D2688:320a-6: par tha mi dad par mkhyen pa ste chos bskyang
T02D2688:320a-7: legs so // ba legs so // khyod kyis de
T02D2688:320a-8: ltar gyis shig ces pa ni rang don rdzogs par
T02D2688:320a-9: legs so // ba legs so // mdzad ces pa'o
T02D2688:320a-10: // ngas khyed la gtad do zhes pas gzhan don
T02D2688:320a-11: yang rdzogs par gyis shig ces pa'o //
T02D2688:320a-12: dper na phas bu la nor gad pa yang tsha
T02D2688:320a-13: bo la sogs pa phyis 'byung ba'i gzhi shugs kyis
T02D2688:320a-14: 'byung ba dang 'dra bar gang zag snod ldan rnams
T02D2688:320a-15: byin gyis rlobs la brgyud pa rgyun ma chad par
T02D2688:320a-17: phan yon la sogs pa gang brda phrad par sla ba ni ma bkral lo //
T02D2688:320a-18: sgrib pa rnam sel la sogs pa //
T02D2688:320a-19: sems dpa' bcu drug rtog pa dang //
T02D2688:320a-21: rig pa'i lha mo'i rgyud rnams dang //
T02D2688:320a-22: kri ya'i rigs bsdus la sogs pa dang //
T02D2688:320a-23: rnal 'byor pa mchog la sogs dang //
T02D2688:320a-24: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs dang //
T02D2688:320a-25: gzungs 'di'i cho ga rgyas gsungs kyang //
T02D2688:320a-26: le lo can rnams spro bskyed /
T02D2688:320a-28: / shin tu bsdus nas bshad pa la //
T02D2688:320a-29: tshul bzhin gzhung nas gsungs pa ltar //
T02D2688:320a-30: phan yon thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02D2688:320a-31: gang gi lcags kyu bzung nas nya ra yis //
T02D2688:320a-32: klu yi phyugs rnams 'bum phrag bton pa ltar //
T02D2688:320a-33: bdag dge kun slong 'gro rnams byang chub kyi //
T02D2688:320a-34: rin chen gling thob mdzad phyir bris pa las //
T02D2688:320a-35: skye 'gyur dge bas gzungs don la 'jug cing //
T02D2688:320a-36: 'gro kun dri med yid bzhin nor thob shog /
T02D2688:320a-37: kun nas skor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri
T02D2688:320a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang /
T02D2688:320a-40: dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa /
T02D2688:320a-41: slob dpon chen po dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2688:320a-43: // / gsangs sngags rig 'dzin sde snod la //
T02D2688:320a-44: mkha' ltar shes rab dang ba ni //
T02D2688:320a-45: nyi ma lta bur ma rmongs pa'i //
T02D2688:320b-0: @320b mkhas pa dza ya de pa la //
T02D2688:320b-1: lang so bande tshul brtsegs kyis //
T02D2688:320b-2: gus bcas mang du gsol btab nas //
T02D2688:320b-3: spu rgyal bod las khyad par du //
T02D2688:320b-4: nad med sa gtsang mdo khams su //
T02D2688:320b-5: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i gzungs mchog gi /
T02D2688:320b-7: bsgyur ba'i dge bas dad ldan rnams //
T02D2688:320b-8: gzungs 'di rgya cher spyod par shog //
T02D2688:320b-9: / pandi ta dza ya de ba dang //
